text: The canton of Arras-2 is an administrative division of the Pas-de-Calais department, in northern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Arras.Décret n° 2014-233 du 24 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département du Pas-de-Calais It consists of the following communes: #Arras (partly) #Athies #Bailleul-Sir-Berthoult #Fampoux #Farbus #Feuchy #Gavrelle #Monchy-le-Preux #Saint-Laurent-Blangy #Saint-Nicolas #Thélus #Willerval ==References== Category:Cantons of Pas-de-Calais
title: Canton of Arras-2
